Position

# Position

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class            | Support        |
| ---------------- | -------------- |
| ```
absolute
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
relative
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
fixed
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
sticky
```   | 🌐 Web only    |
